title: Font for Funeral House
content:
Hello.  
My english isn't good, im looking for funeral house web font.  
Font for content text and logo text.  
I would be most greatful if u would help me.  
Thanks!
author: TerribleNickname

comments.content:
Any advice be good.  
Links, names, articles etc.
[Paratype](http://web.archive.org/web/20130821042219/http:/www.paratype.ru/)'s catalogue comes first to my mind.

Do you need it to have Latin and Cyrillic?

Is there anything about this particular funeral house that sets it apart?

hhp
